author: rickhall
msg: Continued effort to clean up manifest parsing (FELIX-98). This still has a
long way to go, but eventually all manifest parsing, validation, and
normalization will be done in the ManifestParser class.

author: jmarino
msg: remove need for non blocking variant of TargetInvoker and Component.createAsyncTargetInvoker since thread dispatching now down in a bridging interceptor; TargetInvoker now handles both non-blocking and synchronous calls; note that the async variant of TargetInvokers still needs to be removed from References
